about_the_game:
The SURFERS features 4 suits: Bones, Frogtastic, The Creature and Mr. Claw. This rad pack of skins are totally stoked and ready to toast the competition in the TIDAL SHOCK arena.

Tidal Shock is an aquatic 3rd-person arena shooter. There are submersed weapons to find, dive skins to earn and opponents to liquify. The goal is simple – charge the reactor. Problem is, the closer you are to fully charged, the brighter you glow, turning you into an unavoidable target. Neon commandos will strike, 360 degree battles will rage and bullets will boil, lighting up the abyss.

name: Tidal Shock: SURFERS DLC

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.3GHz or better
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 760 or higher and AMD R9 270X or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
